heading: HB08036
0: AN ACT TO ACCELERATE THE DEVELOPMENT OF IDLE AND UNDERUTILIZED AGRICULTURAL LANDS AS MEANS TO GENERATE EMPLOYMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-08-08
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08036
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO ACCELERATE THE DEVELOPMENT OF IDLE AND UNDERUTILIZED AGRICULTURAL LANDS AS MEANS TO GENERATE EMPLOYMENT
ABSTRACT : Aims to utilize idle or underutilized lands by converting one million hectares of public lands into modern productive agricultural resources planted with hybrid corn, cassava, and other high value crops, thereby creating at least one million jobs and annual farm incomes of at least Twenty Five Thousand Pesos.
ALIAS NAME : “Rural Employment Generation Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bravo (M.) (000 2018-09-25)2. Tambunting (000 2019-01-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2018-08-08
